BuildIndexBuffer
void BuildIndexBuffer(
IRenderer* 
pRenderer,
std::
vector<CGeomFace>& 
faces,
std::
vector<CGeomVertex>& 
verts,
std::
vector<int>& 
vertexReferenced,
MeshData* 
pMeshData
)

Creates a index buffer using the specified vertex and face lists.

Parameters
pRenderer
IRenderer*

Graphics device

faces
std::vector<CGeomFace>&

list of faces

verts
std::vector<CGeomVertex>&

list of vertices

vertexReferenced
std::vector<int>&

List indicating which vertices were referenced by the face list

MeshData

place to store created index buffer
